text: Traunstein is a town in the south-eastern part of Bavaria, Germany, and is the administrative center of a much larger district of the same name. ==Geography== The town is at the middle of a region called Chiemgau, about 11 km east of Lake Chiemsee between Munich and Salzburg, 15 km north of the Alps, and 30 km west of Salzburg. ==Twin towns â€“ sister cities== Traunstein is twinned with: * Gap, France * Haywards Heath, England, United Kingdom * Pinerolo, Italy * Wesseling, Germany * Kinross, Scotland ==References== ==Other websites== * * Traunstein Sword Dance Category:Traunstein (district)
title: Traunstein
